column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Roku says : " What 's on your mind ? "
#Text=Sozin says : " I 've been thinking hard about the state of the world lately . "
#Text=Roku says : " Sozin , it is my wedding !
#Text=Right from the start , I was destined to be Fire Lord .
#Text=And although we did n't always know it , you were destined to be the Avatar .
#Text=It 's an amazing stroke of fate we know each other so well , is n't it ?
#Text=Together , we could do ... anything .
#Text=" Roku says : " Yeah , we could .
#Text=" Sozin says : " Our nation is enjoying an unprecedented time of peace and wealth .
#Text=Our people are happy , and we 're so fortunate in so many ways .
#Text=" Roku says : " Where are you going with this ?
#Text=" Sozin says : " I 've been thinking , we should share this prosperity with the rest of the world .
#Text=In our hands is the most successful empire in history .
#Text=It 's time we expanded it .
#Text=" Roku says : " No !
#Text=The four nations are meant to be just that : four .
#Text=" Sozin says : " Roku , you have n't even stopped to consider the possibilities .
#Text=" Roku says : " There are no possibilities .
#Text=This is the last I want to hear about this .
#Text=" Roku says : " That was my first real test as the Avatar .
#Text=Unfortunately , it was many years before I learned that Sozin had gone ahead with his plan , despite my warning .
#Text="
